instruction: Refill of Semaglutide 2 mg/0.74 mL subcutaneous solution, inject once weekly. The refill block shows because the auto-approve covered only the first four pens; a new prior-auth has been faxed and marked urgent.
Change the prescription of Lisinopril to 10 mg oral tablet, take once daily in the morning.

attributes.sig: take once daily in the morning

instruction: For shoulder soreness after the shot, apply ice for ten minutes and rotate injection sites, maybe use the abdomen next time.

coding.display: Education about long term compression therapy
